content: What's the plan to move the error handling into core?

Yonggang Luo said:

What's the plan to move the error handling into core?

Assuming you mean the Error trait, it's currently a work in progress
We're waiting on the provider API to land on nightly, then I need to land the generic member access RFC and the PR which moves the error trait to core unstably

we did discover a new issue just yesterday with how stability attributes on parent modules are handled which would currently prevent us from landing the unstable move of Error into core because right now it would be insta-stable in some cases
so I'm working with the compiler team to figure out how to allow that move purely unstable-ly
but other than that it should basically just be "land two PRs that are mostly done and a minor new compiler feature" and then we will have it in core on nightly
if you're curious about the compiler work that is necessary that's the thread we're discussing it in
